divs: Sighting DetailsWhile sitting on the couch one evening, My roomate and I saw something through the window and ran outside to look and we saw a big, circle, looking UFO that had red and white lights. It was also pretty loud. We were amazed and curious at this object. We then got on the computer and researched UFO's.
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were no other sightings in Stephenville on or around November 30th 2007
